text: Phetchabun () is one of the northern provinces (changwat) of Thailand. As of 2000, 965,784 people live there, and has an area of 12,668.4kmÂ². The Governor is Direk Thuengfang. ==Administrative divisions== The province has 11 districts (amphoe); 117 subdistricts (tambon) and 1261 villages (muban). Category:Provinces of Thailand
title: Phetchabun province
